issue.title: Insert actors from the left panel

content.raw: Given that actors can have hardcoded trajectories within the SDF, it might be more interesting to have a dedicated dialog to insert actors and define a trajectory (possibly skin and animation files as well), which generates the SDF on the fly, rather than inserting them from the left panel using  static SDF like is done for models.
content.html: Given that actors can have hardcoded trajectories within the SDF, it might be more interesting to have a dedicated dialog to insert actors and define a trajectory (possibly skin and animation files as well), which generates the SDF on the fly, rather than inserting them from the left panel using static SDF like is done for models.
